allt.para: There are only 68 days left until 6/8! Can you believe it?

I am so ready to be married to you. I don't know about you, but I've been dreaming about 6/8 for a long time. And not just getting married, but getting married to you. I'm going to be walking around with a ring on my finger, showing it off to everyone because it's a symbol of the fact that I have you as my life partner! How amazing is that? I think I might have the people at work start calling me Lisa's husband.

I'm not prepared to wait 68 more days, but I'll do what I must to get to that day. Celebrating with you is going to be incredible. I already get misty-eyed just thinking about it sometimes. I LOVE YOU!
